fields.summary: Router should support up to 127 static IP address on the LAN facing interface

status.description: SW with updated config was released
status.name: INTEGRATED

fields.Action:
# Access the WebUI, 

 * Go to Advanced -> IPv4 Distribution from the Router UI.
 * Click on "connection list"
 * Edit one of the connection to change it from dynamic to static IP, configure a different IP address.
 * Click on apply.

      2. Disconnect and connect back the client,
fields.Expected Result: Client should get the IP configured as static IP.

fields.Action:
* Verify the "Add static connection" on the connection list page, by providing MAC address, host name and static IP address.
 * Add the client to the network, 
 * Reboot the router.
fields.Expected Result: The client should be assigned the IP configured above.

* Static IP configuration should be retained.
 * Verify that the client now gets DHCP address.

security.description: Only SoftAtHome people can access the issue
security.name: SAH
